alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metro Broward County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 8:13PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Miami-Dade and southern Broward Counties through 845 PM EDT... At 813 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Intersection Krome And U.S. 27, or 12 miles west of Miramar. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pembroke Pines, Miramar and Intersection Krome And U.S. 27. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metro Broward County
